reviewText: Perhaps the poorest video ever made - it gives a bad name to porn. It also has the poorest audio and video I've ever encountered - almost like those in charge were in a contest to see how bad they could make and quality and how well they could bilk the public. These folks should be prohibited from selling on Amazon and, if an appropriate location can be found, publicly flogged.
VHS quality at best and no sound.
